Coldwards is a 4 piece alternative metal band from Houston, Texas
Band Members
;Current
*Paul Crosby - drums (2020-present)
*Zac Crosby - lead vocals, keyboard (2020-present)
*Michael Friese - lead guitar (2020-present)
*Richie Hey - bass (2022-present)
;Former
*Sean Crosby - co-lead vocals, rhythm guitar (2020-2023)
Discography
Studio Albums
*Bloodwork (2022)
